metadata.synopsis: Halsin gives the player a warning that he disapproves of some of their actions while he's a companion (his approval of the player has dropped below a certain threshold).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Lower Halsin's approval to the warning 1 threshold (TBD)

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: My friend, some of your choices have proven... troubling to me.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: I trust you can restore my faith in you - we need each other, but there's a limit to what I can tolerate.
